doc.title: Terry Fator: Live from Las Vegas

credit.role: Himself/Emma Taylor/Winston the Impersonating Turtle/Walter T. Airedale/Maynard Thomkins/Julius/Michael Jackson/Dougie Scott Walker/Vikki/Sean

doc.plot: Experience why America has fallen in love with Terry Fator's irresistible combination of humor and music and his hilarious cast of characters! The million-dollar winner of "America's Got Talent" and his endearing puppets deliver spot-on performances in the styles of many favorite singers.
